name: Cursed Bricks
description:
This is a demo,

consists in 2 levels to explore some of the mechanics the game will have.

The character is a robot, he will fight other robots, and all the characters will be based on bricks. the map too.

The first level is to introduce the player actions in game. the second is platforming and with lava/acid traps. with a little surprise at the end..
